issue.title: [C++] Improve decimal random generation
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13242](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13242). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Right now, random Decimal128 generation in `testing/random.cc` does not support precisions greater than 18. Also, Decimal256 generation is not implemented.
